title: Deviant
description: I met him when we were teenagers. The day he walked out of my life, he took my heart with him.Now, years later and miles away, we would be brought back together again. But I wasn’t that same small-town girl he’d left behind.If Kyle wanted to get close to me again, he’d have to fight for me.CONTAINS: DUBIOUS CONSENTDeviant is a novella in the Quick and Dirty Series. If you like a short and sweet story with instalove and a happily ever after, this book is for you. Every book in the series is completely standalone. Be warned – the sex in this is raw and taboo. It is not for the faint of heart. Now dive in, you dirty little kitten.
author: Nova Monroe
